TestItem.Stem: 3. Which of the sentences below best expresses the essential Information in the highlighted sentence in the passage? Incorrect choices change the meaning in important ways or leave out essential information.

Distractor_list.Distractor: (A) General Lee tried to lure his soldiers into invading the North in order to defeat the Union army.
(B) The Union army was in danger of an invasion by General Lee's army due to Its location in Pennsylvania.
(C) In the hope of luring the Union army into an exposed situation, General Lee's forces marched Into Pennsylvania.
(D) The state of Pennsylvania was a suitable location for drawing out the Union army into a dangerous situation.
